meanings.meaning: the high-water mark of Parisian fashion

vlive.korean: 지금 단풍 절정기라고 하니까요. Now it's the best time to go see it. 듣기 View video UP10TION : 웨더돌 쿤의 <오늘의 날씨>
vlive.english: Now it's the best time to go see it.

examples.korean: the high-water mark of Parisian fashion 발음듣기 파리 패션의 절정기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the high-water mark of Parisian fashion 발음

examples.korean: She has reached the summit of her career. 발음듣기 그녀는 자신의 사회생활의 절정기를 구가하고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: She has reached the summit of her career. 발음

examples.korean: This is children's literature at its best. 발음듣기 이것은 절정기의 아동 문학이다. Neungyule
examples.english: This is children's literature at its best. 발음

examples.korean: Jessica is at the crest of her career. 발음듣기 제시카는 그녀 경력의 절정기에 다다랐다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Jessica is at the crest of her career. 발음

examples.korean: The film is based on a legend from the ancient Mayan civilization, which peaked between 30 and 900 A.D. 발음듣기 이 영화는, 30~900 A.D. 사이에 절정기를 맞았던, 고대 마야 문명의 전설을 기초로 하고 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: The film is based on a legend from the ancient Mayan civilization, which peaked between 30 and 900 A.D. 발음
